com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain

Class StrafingDriveTrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain.DriveTrain
      • com.andoverrobotics.core.drivetrain.StrafingDriveTrain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MecanumDrive

    public abstract class StrafingDriveTrain
extends DriveTrain
    Describes the interface of a DriveTrain that is capable of "strafing," or moving the robot in any direction without turning.
